tool_description: Analyzes tax return forms to identify missing required fields, incomplete sections, and mandatory attachments based on tax regulations.

structured_data_id.description: Reference ID for parsed tax return data

return_type.description: Type of return being checked: individual, corporate, partnership, estate

tax_year.description: Tax year for applying appropriate completeness rules

filing_status.description: Filing status: single, married_joint, married_separate, head_of_household

check_level.description: Completeness check depth: basic, standard, comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid structured data reference: Cannot locate parsed return data with provided ID
Unsupported return type: Use one of [individual, corporate, partnership, estate]
Invalid filing status: Use one of [single, married_joint, married_separate, head_of_household]
Tax year rules unavailable: Completeness rules not defined for specified tax year
Check level not recognized: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive]
usage: Provide structured_data_id from parsed return, return_type, and tax_year. Optionally specify filing_status and check_level. Returns detailed completeness analysis with missing field identification.

completeness_score.description: Percentage of required fields completed (0.0 to 100.0)

missing_required_fields.description: List of required fields that are missing or empty

incomplete_sections.description: Form sections that are partially completed

missing_schedules.description: Required schedules that are not included
